story: Once upon a time, there was a revolutionary whose name was Daenerys Targaryen. Daenerys Targaryen was a Princess from the House Targaryen. The evil Petyr Baelish one day posed a threat to the peace of Daenerys Targaryen. Daenerys Targaryen did not know what to do and went to Lysa Arryn to seek help. Lysa Arryn was a master of teleportation and taught the hero all its secrets. During a long training session in Torrhen's Square at the Autumnal Equinox, Daenerys Targaryen met Ygritte. They immediately got along and decided to travel together. Finally in The Vale of Arryn at sunrise , Daenerys Targaryen faced Petyr Baelish . With the help of Ygritte and thanks to the learnt power of teleportation , the alliance scared away  Petyr Baelish . This is how Daenerys Targaryen managed to save the beloved the castle. In Bear Island celebrated with Ygritte by  having a feast .

story: Jon Snow was Lord for the House Targaryen and was also known in the whole kingdom as a soldier. Everything was quiet when one day Arya Stark threatened the peace of Jon Snow. Our hero was not ready to fight for it, but with the help of  Arya Stark, Jon Snow learnt the power of mind controlling. In The Dreadfort at sunrise ,Jon Snow met Rhaenys Targaryen and they formed an alliance. At the Summer Solstice, Jon Snow and Rhaenys Targaryen were almost in Raventree Hall when they realized Arya Stark was after them. The two friends nevertheless were ready and the battle begun. Jon Snow used mind controlling forcing the enemy to retreat. After the victory, the castle was not under treat anymore. Jon Snow and Rhaenys Targaryen celebrated in Castle Black by making fireworks.

story: Cersei Lannister was Queen regnant for the House Baratheon and was also known in the whole kingdom as a regent. Everything was quiet when one day Robert Baratheon threatened the peace of Cersei Lannister. Cersei Lannister did not know what to do and went to Euron Greyjoy to seek help. Euron Greyjoy was a master of slowing Time and taught the hero all its secrets. On the way to The Twins at the first day of Spring, Cersei Lannister met Jaime Lannister and they immediately became friends. Finally in Crossroads Inn at the Summer Solstice , Cersei Lannister faced Robert Baratheon . With the help of Jaime Lannister and thanks to the learnt power of slowing Time , the alliance scared away  Robert Baratheon . After the victory, the peace was not under treat anymore. Cersei Lannister and Jaime Lannister celebrated in Bear Island by  having a feast.

story: Arya Stark was Lady for the House Stark and was also known in the whole kingdom as a warrior. Arya Stark was having an happy and peaceful life when Tyrion Lannister threatened  The House of Arya Stark . Initially Arya Stark was afraid, but with the help of Lord got stronger and learnt slowing Time. During a long training session in Red Keep at the Autumnal Equinox, Arya Stark met Eddard Stark. They immediately got along and decided to travel together. After travelling across all the kingdom, Arya Stark with the help of Eddard Stark finally found Tyrion Lannister in The Iron Island. A bloody battle begun but Arya Stark thanks to slowing Time powers got the better of Tyrion Lannister. Eventually the peace was safe again. Arya Stark and Eddard Stark went to Oldstones and celebrated by making fireworks.

story: Once upon a time, there was a bureaucrat whose name was Petyr Baelish. Petyr Baelish was a Lord from the House Tyrell. The evil Arya Stark one day posed a threat to the freedom of Petyr Baelish. Initially Petyr Baelish was afraid, but with the help of Joffrey Baratheon got stronger and learnt invisibility. In The Twins at the first day of Spring ,Petyr Baelish met Robert Arryn and they formed an alliance. Finally in Seagard at Christmas , Petyr Baelish faced Arya Stark . With the help of Robert Arryn and thanks to the learnt power of invisibility , the alliance scared away  Arya Stark . This is how Petyr Baelish managed to save the beloved The House. In Bear Island celebrated with Robert Arryn by making fireworks .

story: Once upon a time, there was a spy whose name was Jon Snow. Jon Snow was a King from the House Stark. Jon Snow was having an happy and peaceful life when Cersei Lannister threatened  The House of Jon Snow . Initially Jon Snow was afraid, but with the help of Joanna Lannister got stronger and learnt teleportation. During a long training session in Seagard at the Autumnal Equinox, Jon Snow met Aegon Targaryen. They immediately got along and decided to travel together. After travelling across all the kingdom, Jon Snow with the help of Aegon Targaryen finally found Cersei Lannister in The Trident. A bloody battle begun but Jon Snow thanks to teleportation powers got the better of Cersei Lannister. After the victory, The House was not under treat anymore. Jon Snow and Aegon Targaryen celebrated in The Trident by playing a game.

story: Once upon a time, there was an advisor whose name was Petyr Baelish. Petyr Baelish was a Lord from the House Tyrell. Petyr Baelish was having an happy and peaceful life when Jon Snow threatened  the castle of Petyr Baelish . Initially Petyr Baelish was afraid, but with the help of Willas Tyrell got stronger and learnt invisibility. On the way to White Harbor at the Summer Solstice, Petyr Baelish met Lysa Arryn and they immediately became friends. Finally in Moat Cailin at sunrise , Petyr Baelish faced Jon Snow . With the help of Lysa Arryn and thanks to the learnt power of invisibility , the alliance scared away  Jon Snow . This is how Petyr Baelish managed to save the beloved the treasure. In Torrhen's Square celebrated with Lysa Arryn by listening to a storytelling .

story: Once upon a time, there was a spy whose name was Jon Snow. Jon Snow was a King from the House Stark. Everything was quiet when one day Bran Stark threatened the treasure of Jon Snow. Our hero was not ready to fight for it, but with the help of  Steffon Baratheon, Jon Snow learnt the power of teleportation. During a long training session in Riverlands at Christmas, Jon Snow met Lyanna Stark. They immediately got along and decided to travel together. At the first day of Spring, Jon Snow and Lyanna Stark were almost in Deepwood Motte when they realized Bran Stark was after them. The two friends nevertheless were ready and the battle begun. Jon Snow used teleportation forcing the enemy to retreat. This is how Jon Snow managed to save the beloved the jewel. In The Whispering Wood celebrated with Lyanna Stark by watching a play .

story: Once upon a time, there was a squire whose name was Jon Snow. Jon Snow was a Lord from the House Targaryen. Everything was quiet when one day Petyr Baelish threatened The House of Jon Snow. Our hero was not ready to fight for it, but with the help of  Lyarra Stark, Jon Snow learnt the power of teleportation. On the way to Karhold at sunrise, Jon Snow met Rickard Stark and they immediately became friends. At Christmas, Jon Snow and Rickard Stark were almost in Castle Black when they realized Petyr Baelish was after them. The two friends nevertheless were ready and the battle begun. Jon Snow used teleportation forcing the enemy to retreat. Eventually The House was safe again. Jon Snow and Rickard Stark went to The Trident and celebrated by making fireworks.

story: A long time ago Arya Stark, Lady from the House Stark, was known to be very good as a a warrior. Everything was quiet when one day Cersei Lannister threatened the castle of Arya Stark. Arya Stark did not know what to do and went to Lyarra Stark to seek help. Lyarra Stark was a master of mind controlling and taught the hero all its secrets. On the way to Castle Black at Christmas, Arya Stark met Sansa Stark and they immediately became friends. Finally in Great Sept of Baelor at the first day of Spring , Arya Stark faced Cersei Lannister . With the help of Sansa Stark and thanks to the learnt power of mind controlling , the alliance scared away  Cersei Lannister . This is how Arya Stark managed to save the beloved the freedom. In Oldstones celebrated with Sansa Stark by making fireworks .

story: Jon Snow was Lord for the House Stark and was also known in the whole kingdom as a ruler. The evil Tyrion Lannister one day posed a threat to the jewel of Jon Snow. Jon Snow did not know what to do and went to Shae to seek help. Shae was a master of teleportation and taught the hero all its secrets. In Crossroads Inn at the Winter Solstice ,Jon Snow met Benjen Stark and they formed an alliance. After travelling across all the kingdom, Jon Snow with the help of Benjen Stark finally found Tyrion Lannister in The Ruby Ford. A bloody battle begun but Jon Snow thanks to teleportation powers got the better of Tyrion Lannister. Eventually the treasure was safe again. Jon Snow and Benjen Stark went to Bear Island and celebrated by  having a feast.

story: Once upon a time, there was an official whose name was Tyrion Lannister. Tyrion Lannister was a Lord from the House Lannister. Everything was quiet when one day Jon Snow threatened the castle of Tyrion Lannister. Our hero was not ready to fight for it, but with the help of  Sansa Stark, Tyrion Lannister learnt the power of slowing Time. In The Trident at the Autumnal Equinox ,Tyrion Lannister met Joanna Lannister and they formed an alliance. After travelling across all the kingdom, Tyrion Lannister with the help of Joanna Lannister finally found Jon Snow in Kings Landing. A bloody battle begun but Tyrion Lannister thanks to slowing Time powers got the better of Jon Snow. After the victory, The House was not under treat anymore. Tyrion Lannister and Joanna Lannister celebrated in Raventree Hall by listening to a storytelling.

story: Once upon a time, there was an official whose name was Tyrion Lannister. Tyrion Lannister was a Lord from the House Lannister. Everything was quiet when one day Robert Baratheon threatened the peace of Tyrion Lannister. Initially Tyrion Lannister was afraid, but with the help of Edric Storm got stronger and learnt gravity Control. On the way to Kings Landing at Christmas, Tyrion Lannister met Tywin Lannister and they immediately became friends. Finally in Riverlands at Night , Tyrion Lannister faced Robert Baratheon . With the help of Tywin Lannister and thanks to the learnt power of gravity Control , the alliance scared away  Robert Baratheon . Eventually the treasure was safe again. Tyrion Lannister and Tywin Lannister went to Seagard and celebrated by watching a play.

story: A long time ago Arya Stark, Lady from the House Stark, was known to be very good as a a warrior. Arya Stark was having an happy and peaceful life when Robert Baratheon threatened  the freedom of Arya Stark . Arya Stark did not know what to do and went to Stannis Baratheon to seek help. Stannis Baratheon was a master of fire sorcery and taught the hero all its secrets. In The Iron Island at sunrise ,Arya Stark met Sansa Stark and they formed an alliance. Finally in Bear Island at the Summer Solstice , Arya Stark faced Robert Baratheon . With the help of Sansa Stark and thanks to the learnt power of fire sorcery , the alliance scared away  Robert Baratheon . After the victory, The House was not under treat anymore. Arya Stark and Sansa Stark celebrated in The Iron Island by watching a play.

story: A long time ago Margaery Tyrell, Queen consort from the House Tyrell, was known to be very good as a an influencer. The evil Jon Snow one day posed a threat to the jewel of Margaery Tyrell. Our hero was not ready to fight for it, but with the help of  Daario Naharis, Margaery Tyrell learnt the power of gravity Control. In Great Sept of Baelor at Night ,Margaery Tyrell met Willas Tyrell and they formed an alliance. At the first day of Spring, Margaery Tyrell and Willas Tyrell were almost in The Iron Island when they realized Jon Snow was after them. The two friends nevertheless were ready and the battle begun. Margaery Tyrell used gravity Control forcing the enemy to retreat. This is how Margaery Tyrell managed to save the beloved The House. In Oldstones celebrated with Willas Tyrell by listening to a storytelling .

story: Petyr Baelish was Lord for the House Tyrell and was also known in the whole kingdom as a procurer. Petyr Baelish was having an happy and peaceful life when Jon Snow threatened  The House of Petyr Baelish . Petyr Baelish did not know what to do and went to Edric Storm to seek help. Edric Storm was a master of military strategy and taught the hero all its secrets. In The Whispering Wood at the Autumnal Equinox ,Petyr Baelish met Lysa Arryn and they formed an alliance. Finally in Bear Island at Night , Petyr Baelish faced Jon Snow . With the help of Lysa Arryn and thanks to the learnt power of military strategy , the alliance scared away  Jon Snow . This is how Petyr Baelish managed to save the beloved The House. In The Vale of Arryn celebrated with Lysa Arryn by making fireworks .

story: A long time ago Tyrion Lannister, Lord from the House Lannister, was known to be very good as a a murderer. Tyrion Lannister was having an happy and peaceful life when Arya Stark threatened  the peace of Tyrion Lannister . Our hero was not ready to fight for it, but with the help of  Rickard Stark, Tyrion Lannister learnt the power of invisibility. During a long training session in Saltpans at the Autumnal Equinox, Tyrion Lannister met Shae. They immediately got along and decided to travel together. Finally in White Harbor at the first day of Spring , Tyrion Lannister faced Arya Stark . With the help of Shae and thanks to the learnt power of invisibility , the alliance scared away  Arya Stark . After the victory, The House was not under treat anymore. Tyrion Lannister and Shae celebrated in Crossroads Inn by listening to a storytelling.

story: Margaery Tyrell was Queen consort for the House Tyrell and was also known in the whole kingdom as an influencer. Margaery Tyrell was having an happy and peaceful life when Tyrion Lannister threatened  the jewel of Margaery Tyrell . Margaery Tyrell did not know what to do and went to Sansa Stark to seek help. Sansa Stark was a master of gravity Control and taught the hero all its secrets. During a long training session in Castle Black at sunrise, Margaery Tyrell met Willas Tyrell. They immediately got along and decided to travel together. After travelling across all the kingdom, Margaery Tyrell with the help of Willas Tyrell finally found Tyrion Lannister in The Trident. A bloody battle begun but Margaery Tyrell thanks to gravity Control powers got the better of Tyrion Lannister. Eventually the freedom was safe again. Margaery Tyrell and Willas Tyrell went to Kings Landing and celebrated by listening to a storytelling.

story: Bran Stark was Lord for the House Stark and was also known in the whole kingdom as a prophet. Bran Stark was having an happy and peaceful life when Cersei Lannister threatened  the jewel of Bran Stark . Our hero was not ready to fight for it, but with the help of  Bran Stark, Bran Stark learnt the power of mind controlling. During a long training session in Oldstones at the Winter Solstice, Bran Stark met Eddard Stark. They immediately got along and decided to travel together. At the Winter Solstice, Bran Stark and Eddard Stark were almost in The Trident when they realized Cersei Lannister was after them. The two friends nevertheless were ready and the battle begun. Bran Stark used mind controlling forcing the enemy to retreat. After the victory, the peace was not under treat anymore. Bran Stark and Eddard Stark celebrated in Winterfell by organizing a concert.

story: A long time ago Robert Baratheon, King of the Andals the Rhoynar and the First Men from the House Baratheon, was known to be very good as a a revolutionary. Robert Baratheon was having an happy and peaceful life when Arya Stark threatened  the treasure of Robert Baratheon . Initially Robert Baratheon was afraid, but with the help of Daenerys Targaryen got stronger and learnt fire sorcery. During a long training session in The Trident at the Autumnal Equinox, Robert Baratheon met Edric Storm. They immediately got along and decided to travel together. Finally in The Twins at the first day of Spring , Robert Baratheon faced Arya Stark . With the help of Edric Storm and thanks to the learnt power of fire sorcery , the alliance scared away  Arya Stark . After the victory, The House was not under treat anymore. Robert Baratheon and Edric Storm celebrated in Bear Island by watching a play.

story: Tyrion Lannister was Lord for the House Lannister and was also known in the whole kingdom as a revolutionary. The evil Arya Stark one day posed a threat to the treasure of Tyrion Lannister. Tyrion Lannister did not know what to do and went to Daenerys Targaryen to seek help. Daenerys Targaryen was a master of mind controlling and taught the hero all its secrets. On the way to Riverlands at the Winter Solstice, Tyrion Lannister met Cersei Lannister and they immediately became friends. At Christmas, Tyrion Lannister and Cersei Lannister were almost in Raventree Hall when they realized Arya Stark was after them. The two friends nevertheless were ready and the battle begun. Tyrion Lannister used mind controlling forcing the enemy to retreat. After the victory, the treasure was not under treat anymore. Tyrion Lannister and Cersei Lannister celebrated in The Trident by organizing a concert.

story: A long time ago Petyr Baelish, Lord from the House Tyrell, was known to be very good as a a procurer. Petyr Baelish was having an happy and peaceful life when Bran Stark threatened  the peace of Petyr Baelish . Our hero was not ready to fight for it, but with the help of  Stannis Baratheon, Petyr Baelish learnt the power of gravity Control. During a long training session in The Whispering Wood at Christmas, Petyr Baelish met Lysa Arryn. They immediately got along and decided to travel together. At sunrise, Petyr Baelish and Lysa Arryn were almost in Raventree Hall when they realized Bran Stark was after them. The two friends nevertheless were ready and the battle begun. Petyr Baelish used gravity Control forcing the enemy to retreat. After the victory, the treasure was not under treat anymore. Petyr Baelish and Lysa Arryn celebrated in Deepwood Motte by  having a feast.

story: Cersei Lannister was Queen regnant for the House Lannister and was also known in the whole kingdom as an advisor. Everything was quiet when one day Robert Baratheon threatened the castle of Cersei Lannister. Our hero was not ready to fight for it, but with the help of  Tommen Baratheon, Cersei Lannister learnt the power of invisibility. In White Harbor at the first day of Spring ,Cersei Lannister met Shae and they formed an alliance. Finally in Moat Cailin at the first day of Spring , Cersei Lannister faced Robert Baratheon . With the help of Shae and thanks to the learnt power of invisibility , the alliance scared away  Robert Baratheon . This is how Cersei Lannister managed to save the beloved the jewel. In Kings Landing celebrated with Shae by playing a game .

story: Once upon a time, there was an influencer whose name was Margaery Tyrell. Margaery Tyrell was a Queen consort from the House Tyrell. Everything was quiet when one day Bran Stark threatened The House of Margaery Tyrell. Our hero was not ready to fight for it, but with the help of  Tommen Baratheon, Margaery Tyrell learnt the power of military strategy. In The Trident at the Summer Solstice ,Margaery Tyrell met Alerie Tyrell and they formed an alliance. After travelling across all the kingdom, Margaery Tyrell with the help of Alerie Tyrell finally found Bran Stark in Castle Black. A bloody battle begun but Margaery Tyrell thanks to military strategy powers got the better of Bran Stark. This is how Margaery Tyrell managed to save the beloved the castle. In Riverlands celebrated with Alerie Tyrell by playing a game .

story: Daenerys Targaryen was Princess for the House Targaryen and was also known in the whole kingdom as a ruler. The evil Bran Stark one day posed a threat to the jewel of Daenerys Targaryen. Daenerys Targaryen did not know what to do and went to Bran Stark to seek help. Bran Stark was a master of mind controlling and taught the hero all its secrets. During a long training session in The Iron Island at the Winter Solstice, Daenerys Targaryen met Jon Snow. They immediately got along and decided to travel together. Finally in Bear Island at the Summer Solstice , Daenerys Targaryen faced Bran Stark . With the help of Jon Snow and thanks to the learnt power of mind controlling , the alliance scared away  Bran Stark . Eventually the treasure was safe again. Daenerys Targaryen and Jon Snow went to The Ruby Ford and celebrated by listening to a storytelling.

story: Bran Stark was Lord for the House Stark and was also known in the whole kingdom as a prophet. Everything was quiet when one day Tyrion Lannister threatened the jewel of Bran Stark. Bran Stark did not know what to do and went to King to seek help. King was a master of military strategy and taught the hero all its secrets. In White Harbor at the first day of Spring ,Bran Stark met Catelyn Stark and they formed an alliance. After travelling across all the kingdom, Bran Stark with the help of Catelyn Stark finally found Tyrion Lannister in The Eyrie. A bloody battle begun but Bran Stark thanks to military strategy powers got the better of Tyrion Lannister. Eventually the jewel was safe again. Bran Stark and Catelyn Stark went to Red Keep and celebrated by  having a feast.

story: A long time ago Robert Baratheon, Lord from the House Baratheon, was known to be very good as a a military leader. The evil Petyr Baelish one day posed a threat to the castle of Robert Baratheon. Robert Baratheon did not know what to do and went to Robert Baratheon to seek help. Robert Baratheon was a master of gravity Control and taught the hero all its secrets. During a long training session in Karhold at the Summer Solstice, Robert Baratheon met Renly Baratheon. They immediately got along and decided to travel together. Finally in Red Keep at Christmas , Robert Baratheon faced Petyr Baelish . With the help of Renly Baratheon and thanks to the learnt power of gravity Control , the alliance scared away  Petyr Baelish . Eventually The House was safe again. Robert Baratheon and Renly Baratheon went to Moat Cailin and celebrated by organizing a concert.

story: Bran Stark was Lord for the House Stark and was also known in the whole kingdom as a prophet. The evil Tyrion Lannister one day posed a threat to the treasure of Bran Stark. Bran Stark did not know what to do and went to Benjen Stark to seek help. Benjen Stark was a master of invisibility and taught the hero all its secrets. On the way to The Iron Island at Night, Bran Stark met Catelyn Stark and they immediately became friends. After travelling across all the kingdom, Bran Stark with the help of Catelyn Stark finally found Tyrion Lannister in The Vale of Arryn. A bloody battle begun but Bran Stark thanks to invisibility powers got the better of Tyrion Lannister. Eventually the freedom was safe again. Bran Stark and Catelyn Stark went to Deepwood Motte and celebrated by making fireworks.

story: Once upon a time, there was a mass murderer whose name was Cersei Lannister. Cersei Lannister was a Queen regnant from the House Baratheon. Cersei Lannister was having an happy and peaceful life when Jon Snow threatened  the freedom of Cersei Lannister . Initially Cersei Lannister was afraid, but with the help of Joanna Lannister got stronger and learnt teleportation. In The Twins at Night ,Cersei Lannister met Myrcella Baratheon and they formed an alliance. After travelling across all the kingdom, Cersei Lannister with the help of Myrcella Baratheon finally found Jon Snow in Moat Cailin. A bloody battle begun but Cersei Lannister thanks to teleportation powers got the better of Jon Snow. Eventually The House was safe again. Cersei Lannister and Myrcella Baratheon went to Winterfell and celebrated by  having a feast.

story: Bran Stark was Lord for the House Stark and was also known in the whole kingdom as a prophet. Bran Stark was having an happy and peaceful life when Daenerys Targaryen threatened  the castle of Bran Stark . Bran Stark did not know what to do and went to Robert Arryn to seek help. Robert Arryn was a master of military strategy and taught the hero all its secrets. On the way to The Vale of Arryn at the first day of Spring, Bran Stark met Catelyn Stark and they immediately became friends. Finally in Moat Cailin at Christmas , Bran Stark faced Daenerys Targaryen . With the help of Catelyn Stark and thanks to the learnt power of military strategy , the alliance scared away  Daenerys Targaryen . This is how Bran Stark managed to save the beloved The House. In The Whispering Wood celebrated with Catelyn Stark by listening to a storytelling .

story: Once upon a time, there was a soldier whose name was Jon Snow. Jon Snow was a Lord from the House Stark. The evil Petyr Baelish one day posed a threat to the treasure of Jon Snow. Our hero was not ready to fight for it, but with the help of  Benjen Stark, Jon Snow learnt the power of teleportation. On the way to White Harbor at Christmas, Jon Snow met Lyanna Stark and they immediately became friends. At the first day of Spring, Jon Snow and Lyanna Stark were almost in Castle Black when they realized Petyr Baelish was after them. The two friends nevertheless were ready and the battle begun. Jon Snow used teleportation forcing the enemy to retreat. This is how Jon Snow managed to save the beloved the treasure. In Winterfell celebrated with Lyanna Stark by playing a game .

story: A long time ago Tyrion Lannister, Lord from the House Lannister, was known to be very good as a an official. Everything was quiet when one day Arya Stark threatened the freedom of Tyrion Lannister. Tyrion Lannister did not know what to do and went to Benjen Stark to seek help. Benjen Stark was a master of invisibility and taught the hero all its secrets. On the way to Riverlands at the first day of Spring, Tyrion Lannister met Jaime Lannister and they immediately became friends. Finally in Saltpans at the Summer Solstice , Tyrion Lannister faced Arya Stark . With the help of Jaime Lannister and thanks to the learnt power of invisibility , the alliance scared away  Arya Stark . After the victory, the freedom was not under treat anymore. Tyrion Lannister and Jaime Lannister celebrated in Bear Island by listening to a storytelling.

story: Arya Stark was Lady for the House Stark and was also known in the whole kingdom as an assassin. The evil Daenerys Targaryen one day posed a threat to the peace of Arya Stark. Initially Arya Stark was afraid, but with the help of Robert Arryn got stronger and learnt military strategy. In Crossroads Inn at the Autumnal Equinox ,Arya Stark met Bran Stark and they formed an alliance. At the Summer Solstice, Arya Stark and Bran Stark were almost in The Twins when they realized Daenerys Targaryen was after them. The two friends nevertheless were ready and the battle begun. Arya Stark used military strategy forcing the enemy to retreat. This is how Arya Stark managed to save the beloved The House. In Torrhen's Square celebrated with Bran Stark by making fireworks .

story: A long time ago Daenerys Targaryen, Princess from the House Targaryen, was known to be very good as a a ruler. Everything was quiet when one day Bran Stark threatened the treasure of Daenerys Targaryen. Our hero was not ready to fight for it, but with the help of  Stannis Baratheon, Daenerys Targaryen learnt the power of slowing Time. On the way to Moat Cailin at the Winter Solstice, Daenerys Targaryen met Rickard Stark and they immediately became friends. At the Winter Solstice, Daenerys Targaryen and Rickard Stark were almost in Kings Landing when they realized Bran Stark was after them. The two friends nevertheless were ready and the battle begun. Daenerys Targaryen used slowing Time forcing the enemy to retreat. Eventually the castle was safe again. Daenerys Targaryen and Rickard Stark went to Winterfell and celebrated by watching a play.

story: Once upon a time, there was a prophet whose name was Bran Stark. Bran Stark was a Lord from the House Stark. Bran Stark was having an happy and peaceful life when Cersei Lannister threatened  the peace of Bran Stark . Our hero was not ready to fight for it, but with the help of  Viserys Targaryen, Bran Stark learnt the power of slowing Time. In Winterfell at Christmas ,Bran Stark met Sansa Stark and they formed an alliance. Finally in Oldstones at the Winter Solstice , Bran Stark faced Cersei Lannister . With the help of Sansa Stark and thanks to the learnt power of slowing Time , the alliance scared away  Cersei Lannister . After the victory, The House was not under treat anymore. Bran Stark and Sansa Stark celebrated in Karhold by organizing a concert.

story: Once upon a time, there was a bureaucrat whose name was Petyr Baelish. Petyr Baelish was a Lord from the House Tyrell. The evil Robert Baratheon one day posed a threat to the peace of Petyr Baelish. Our hero was not ready to fight for it, but with the help of  Joanna Lannister, Petyr Baelish learnt the power of gravity Control. During a long training session in Saltpans at the Winter Solstice, Petyr Baelish met Robert Arryn. They immediately got along and decided to travel together. At Night, Petyr Baelish and Robert Arryn were almost in Red Keep when they realized Robert Baratheon was after them. The two friends nevertheless were ready and the battle begun. Petyr Baelish used gravity Control forcing the enemy to retreat. This is how Petyr Baelish managed to save the beloved the peace. In The Ruby Ford celebrated with Robert Arryn by getting married .

story: Once upon a time, there was a mass murderer whose name was Arya Stark. Arya Stark was a Lady from the House Stark. Everything was quiet when one day Robert Baratheon threatened the jewel of Arya Stark. Our hero was not ready to fight for it, but with the help of  Catelyn Stark, Arya Stark learnt the power of military strategy. On the way to The Whispering Wood at the Summer Solstice, Arya Stark met Rickon Stark and they immediately became friends. After travelling across all the kingdom, Arya Stark with the help of Rickon Stark finally found Robert Baratheon in Crossroads Inn. A bloody battle begun but Arya Stark thanks to military strategy powers got the better of Robert Baratheon. Eventually the castle was safe again. Arya Stark and Rickon Stark went to Castle Black and celebrated by playing a game.

story: Once upon a time, there was a prophet whose name was Bran Stark. Bran Stark was a Lord from the House Stark. Bran Stark was having an happy and peaceful life when Tyrion Lannister threatened  The House of Bran Stark . Bran Stark did not know what to do and went to Robert Arryn to seek help. Robert Arryn was a master of slowing Time and taught the hero all its secrets. During a long training session in Riverlands at the Autumnal Equinox, Bran Stark met Sansa Stark. They immediately got along and decided to travel together. Finally in Castle Black at Night , Bran Stark faced Tyrion Lannister . With the help of Sansa Stark and thanks to the learnt power of slowing Time , the alliance scared away  Tyrion Lannister . After the victory, the castle was not under treat anymore. Bran Stark and Sansa Stark celebrated in Seagard by playing a game.

story: A long time ago Cersei Lannister, Queen regnant from the House Lannister, was known to be very good as a an advisor. Everything was quiet when one day Daenerys Targaryen threatened the peace of Cersei Lannister. Initially Cersei Lannister was afraid, but with the help of Edric Storm got stronger and learnt gravity Control. On the way to Raventree Hall at the Summer Solstice, Cersei Lannister met Jaime Lannister and they immediately became friends. At the Autumnal Equinox, Cersei Lannister and Jaime Lannister were almost in Kings Landing when they realized Daenerys Targaryen was after them. The two friends nevertheless were ready and the battle begun. Cersei Lannister used gravity Control forcing the enemy to retreat. This is how Cersei Lannister managed to save the beloved the freedom. In Deepwood Motte celebrated with Jaime Lannister by watching a play .

story: Petyr Baelish was Lord for the House Tyrell and was also known in the whole kingdom as a murderer. Petyr Baelish was having an happy and peaceful life when Arya Stark threatened  the jewel of Petyr Baelish . Initially Petyr Baelish was afraid, but with the help of Robb Stark got stronger and learnt teleportation. During a long training session in The Dreadfort at sunrise, Petyr Baelish met Robert Arryn. They immediately got along and decided to travel together. After travelling across all the kingdom, Petyr Baelish with the help of Robert Arryn finally found Arya Stark in Castle Black. A bloody battle begun but Petyr Baelish thanks to teleportation powers got the better of Arya Stark. This is how Petyr Baelish managed to save the beloved the peace. In Crossroads Inn celebrated with Robert Arryn by getting married .

story: Margaery Tyrell was Queen consort for the House Tyrell and was also known in the whole kingdom as an influencer. The evil Bran Stark one day posed a threat to the castle of Margaery Tyrell. Margaery Tyrell did not know what to do and went to Lysa Arryn to seek help. Lysa Arryn was a master of military strategy and taught the hero all its secrets. During a long training session in Moat Cailin at the Autumnal Equinox, Margaery Tyrell met Alerie Tyrell. They immediately got along and decided to travel together. At sunrise, Margaery Tyrell and Alerie Tyrell were almost in Crossroads Inn when they realized Bran Stark was after them. The two friends nevertheless were ready and the battle begun. Margaery Tyrell used military strategy forcing the enemy to retreat. After the victory, The House was not under treat anymore. Margaery Tyrell and Alerie Tyrell celebrated in Raventree Hall by  having a feast.

story: Tyrion Lannister was Lord for the House Lannister and was also known in the whole kingdom as an official. Tyrion Lannister was having an happy and peaceful life when Jon Snow threatened  the peace of Tyrion Lannister . Our hero was not ready to fight for it, but with the help of  Tywin Lannister, Tyrion Lannister learnt the power of teleportation. On the way to Bear Island at the Summer Solstice, Tyrion Lannister met Shae and they immediately became friends. Finally in Winterfell at Christmas , Tyrion Lannister faced Jon Snow . With the help of Shae and thanks to the learnt power of teleportation , the alliance scared away  Jon Snow . Eventually the castle was safe again. Tyrion Lannister and Shae went to Castle Black and celebrated by  having a feast.

story: Jon Snow was King for the House Stark and was also known in the whole kingdom as a squire. Jon Snow was having an happy and peaceful life when Margaery Tyrell threatened  the freedom of Jon Snow . Initially Jon Snow was afraid, but with the help of Arya Stark got stronger and learnt mind controlling. During a long training session in Riverlands at the Winter Solstice, Jon Snow met Rickard Stark. They immediately got along and decided to travel together. At the Autumnal Equinox, Jon Snow and Rickard Stark were almost in Crossroads Inn when they realized Margaery Tyrell was after them. The two friends nevertheless were ready and the battle begun. Jon Snow used mind controlling forcing the enemy to retreat. Eventually the jewel was safe again. Jon Snow and Rickard Stark went to Kings Landing and celebrated by making fireworks.

story: Jon Snow was Lord for the House Stark and was also known in the whole kingdom as a soldier. Everything was quiet when one day Petyr Baelish threatened the castle of Jon Snow. Initially Jon Snow was afraid, but with the help of Rhaenys Targaryen got stronger and learnt gravity Control. During a long training session in The Iron Island at the Autumnal Equinox, Jon Snow met Hizdahr zo Loraq. They immediately got along and decided to travel together. After travelling across all the kingdom, Jon Snow with the help of Hizdahr zo Loraq finally found Petyr Baelish in Great Sept of Baelor. A bloody battle begun but Jon Snow thanks to gravity Control powers got the better of Petyr Baelish. After the victory, The House was not under treat anymore. Jon Snow and Hizdahr zo Loraq celebrated in Kings Landing by organizing a concert.

story: Once upon a time, there was a prophet whose name was Bran Stark. Bran Stark was a Lord from the House Stark. Everything was quiet when one day Margaery Tyrell threatened the freedom of Bran Stark. Our hero was not ready to fight for it, but with the help of  Alerie Tyrell, Bran Stark learnt the power of slowing Time. During a long training session in The Twins at Night, Bran Stark met Catelyn Stark. They immediately got along and decided to travel together. After travelling across all the kingdom, Bran Stark with the help of Catelyn Stark finally found Margaery Tyrell in Karhold. A bloody battle begun but Bran Stark thanks to slowing Time powers got the better of Margaery Tyrell. This is how Bran Stark managed to save the beloved the freedom. In Kings Landing celebrated with Catelyn Stark by watching a play .

story: Once upon a time, there was an assassin whose name was Arya Stark. Arya Stark was a Lady from the House Stark. Everything was quiet when one day Margaery Tyrell threatened the freedom of Arya Stark. Initially Arya Stark was afraid, but with the help of Rhaella Targaryen got stronger and learnt slowing Time. During a long training session in The Iron Island at sunrise, Arya Stark met Robb Stark. They immediately got along and decided to travel together. Finally in Raventree Hall at Night , Arya Stark faced Margaery Tyrell . With the help of Robb Stark and thanks to the learnt power of slowing Time , the alliance scared away  Margaery Tyrell . This is how Arya Stark managed to save the beloved the castle. In Karhold celebrated with Robb Stark by making fireworks .

story: Once upon a time, there was a warrior whose name was Arya Stark. Arya Stark was a Lady from the House Stark. Arya Stark was having an happy and peaceful life when Daenerys Targaryen threatened  the peace of Arya Stark . Our hero was not ready to fight for it, but with the help of  Margaery Tyrell, Arya Stark learnt the power of invisibility. During a long training session in Bear Island at Night, Arya Stark met Eddard Stark. They immediately got along and decided to travel together. After travelling across all the kingdom, Arya Stark with the help of Eddard Stark finally found Daenerys Targaryen in Bear Island. A bloody battle begun but Arya Stark thanks to invisibility powers got the better of Daenerys Targaryen. After the victory, the treasure was not under treat anymore. Arya Stark and Eddard Stark celebrated in The Dreadfort by listening to a storytelling.

story: Once upon a time, there was a revolutionary whose name was Tyrion Lannister. Tyrion Lannister was a Lord from the House Lannister. The evil Daenerys Targaryen one day posed a threat to the peace of Tyrion Lannister. Initially Tyrion Lannister was afraid, but with the help of Catelyn Stark got stronger and learnt military strategy. In Deepwood Motte at the Autumnal Equinox ,Tyrion Lannister met Cersei Lannister and they formed an alliance. At the Winter Solstice, Tyrion Lannister and Cersei Lannister were almost in Seagard when they realized Daenerys Targaryen was after them. The two friends nevertheless were ready and the battle begun. Tyrion Lannister used military strategy forcing the enemy to retreat. After the victory, The House was not under treat anymore. Tyrion Lannister and Cersei Lannister celebrated in The Iron Island by  having a feast.

story: Petyr Baelish was Lord for the House Tyrell and was also known in the whole kingdom as a bureaucrat. Petyr Baelish was having an happy and peaceful life when Margaery Tyrell threatened  the peace of Petyr Baelish . Initially Petyr Baelish was afraid, but with the help of Mace Tyrell got stronger and learnt slowing Time. On the way to Riverlands at the Autumnal Equinox, Petyr Baelish met Lysa Arryn and they immediately became friends. Finally in Deepwood Motte at Christmas , Petyr Baelish faced Margaery Tyrell . With the help of Lysa Arryn and thanks to the learnt power of slowing Time , the alliance scared away  Margaery Tyrell . After the victory, the castle was not under treat anymore. Petyr Baelish and Lysa Arryn celebrated in Crossroads Inn by organizing a concert.

story: A long time ago Jon Snow, Lord from the House Targaryen, was known to be very good as a a soldier. Jon Snow was having an happy and peaceful life when Arya Stark threatened  the jewel of Jon Snow . Initially Jon Snow was afraid, but with the help of Jaime Lannister got stronger and learnt fire sorcery. On the way to Moat Cailin at the Summer Solstice, Jon Snow met Lyarra Stark and they immediately became friends. Finally in Crossroads Inn at Night , Jon Snow faced Arya Stark . With the help of Lyarra Stark and thanks to the learnt power of fire sorcery , the alliance scared away  Arya Stark . After the victory, the castle was not under treat anymore. Jon Snow and Lyarra Stark celebrated in The Iron Island by getting married.
